nodes.description: Ofir Rahum was shot and killed by Palestinian gunmen in Ramallah.
nodes.support_text: Jan 17, 2001 - Ofir Rahum, 16, of Ashkelon, traveled to Jerusalem to meet a young woman with whom he had conducted a relationship over the Internet. She then drove him toward Ramallah. At a prearranged location, another vehicle drove up and three Palestinian gunmen inside shot Rahum more than 15 times.

nodes.description: Shalhevet Pass was killed by sniper fire in Hebron.
nodes.support_text: Mar 26, 2001 - Shalhevet Pass, age 10 months, was killed by sniper fire at the entrance to the Avraham Avinu neighborhood in Hebron

nodes.description: Eliran Rosenberg-Zayat and Naftali Lanzkron were killed in a suicide bombing at the Mifgash Hashalom gas station near Kalkilya.
nodes.support_text: Mar 28, 2001 - Eliran Rosenberg-Zayat, 15, of Givat Shmuel and Naftali Lanzkron, 13, of Petah Tikva were killed in a suicide bombing at the Mifgash Hashalom (''peace stop'') gas station several hundred meters from an IDF roadblock near the entrance to Kalkilya, east of Kfar Saba.

nodes.description: Yossi Ish-Ran and Kobi Mandell were stoned to death in a cave near Tekoa.
nodes.support_text: May 9, 2001 - Yossi Ish-Ran, 14, and Kobi Mandell, 14, both of Tekoa, were found stoned to death in a cave about 200 meters from the small community south of Jerusalem where they lived.

nodes.description: Marina Berkovizki and nine others were killed in a suicide bombing at a disco near Tel Aviv's Dolphinarium.
nodes.support_text: June 1, 2001 - Marina Berkovizki, 17, Anya Kazachkov, 16, of Holon; Katherine Kastaniyada-Talkir, 15, of Ramat Gan; Aleksei Lupalu, 16, of the Ukraine; Mariana Medvedenko, 16, of Tel Aviv; Irina Nepomneschi, 16, of Bat Yam;Yulia Nelimov, 16, of Tel Aviv; Raisa Nimrovsky, 15, of Netanya; Liana Sakiyan, 16, of Tel Aviv; Maria Tagilchev, 14, of Netanya; and Irena Usdachi, 18, of Holon were killed when a suicide bomber blew himself outside a disco near Tel Aviv's Dolphinarium along the seafront promenade just before midnight on Friday.

nodes.description: Yehuda Shoham died from injuries incurred in a fatal stoning near Shilo.
nodes.support_text: June 11, 2001 - Yehuda Shoham, aged 5 months, of Shilo, died of injuries incurred in a fatal stoning on June 5. He was critically injured by a rock thrown at the family's car near Shilo in Samaria.

nodes.description: Ronen Landau was shot and killed while returning home from Jerusalem.
nodes.support_text: July 26, 2001 - Ronen Landau, 17, of Givat Ze'ev, was shot and killed by Palestinian terrorists while returning home from Jerusalem with his father.

nodes.description: Michal Raziel, Malka Roth, Ra'aya Schijveschuurder, Avraham Yitzhak Schijveschuurder, Hemda Schijveschuurder, Tamara Shimashvili, and Yocheved Shoshan were killed in a suicide bombing at the Sbarro pizzeria in Jerusalem.
nodes.support_text: Aug 9, 2001 -Michal Raziel, 16, of Jerusalem; Malka Roth, 15, of Jerusalem Ra'aya Schijveschuurder, 14, of Neria; Avraham Yitzhak Schijveschuurder, 4, of Neria; Hemda Schijveschuurder, 2, of Neria; Tamara Shimashvili, 8, of Jerusalem; and Yocheved Shoshan, 10, of Jerusalem were killed in a suicide bombing at the Sbarro pizzeria on the corner of King George Street and Jaffa Road in the center of Jerusalem.

nodes.description: Aliza Malka was killed in a drive-by shooting at Kibbutz Merav.
nodes.support_text: Aug 9, 2001 - Aliza Malka, 17, a boarding student at Kibbutz Merav, was killed by terrorists in a drive-by shooting at the entrance to the kibbutz in the Gilboa region

nodes.description: Shoshana Ben Ishai and Menashe Regev were killed in a shooting at a bus stop in northern Jerusalem.
nodes.support_text: Nov 4, 2001 - Shoshana Ben Ishai, 16, of Betar Illit and Menashe (Meni) Regev, 14, of Jerusalem were killed when a Palestinian terrorist opened fire with a sub-machine gun shortly before 16:00 at a No. 25 Egged bus at the French Hill junction in northern Jerusalem...
